title: Stories on a train = The Tale of Georgie Grub ...
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Reading
description: Episode of Series "Dorothy Butler's Video Books". A video designed to encourage children to read and enjoy books. Ten different stories, many from well known books, are told by professional storytellers and have been selected for children aged five to eight years old. Introduced by Dorothy Butler. The stories are: "Troublesome pig", " The Grand old Duke of York", "Grandma goes shopping", "Lucky Hans", "On Friday something funny happened", "Wolf! Wolf!", "The Tale of Georgie Grub", "Everybody said no!", "Mr. Biff the boxer" and "The Trouble with Jack".
